results.title: ServiceNow Documentation - Incident Management
results.content: Incident Management is a process for managing the lifecycle of incidents. An incident is an unplanned interruption to an IT service or reduction in the quality of an IT service.

results.title: ServiceNow Best Practices - Business Rules
results.content: Business Rules are server-side scripts that execute when a record is displayed, inserted, updated, or deleted. Best practice: Avoid using current.update() in Business Rules.
